# Noran Neurology Globalization Analytics Platform

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js application showcasing data-driven globalization insights for Noran Neurology clinic.

## Progress Tracking

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4 (new @import syntax)
- Framer Motion (animations)
- Recharts & D3.js (data visualization)
- Three.js (3D graphics)
- Lucide React (icons)

## Features Implemented
- Real-time demographic visualizations
- Language distribution analytics with growth rates
- Historical and projected population trends
- Location-based diversity insights
- 3D globe visualization with Three.js
- AI-powered strategic recommendations
- Healthcare language access analysis
- Interactive animated charts

## Data Sources
All demographic data sourced from:
- US Census Bureau
- Minnesota Compass
- Migration Policy Institute
- Minnesota Department of Health

## Application Access
The platform is running at: **http://localhost:3000**
